targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) FROM domains
SELECT count(*) FROM domains WHERE name LIKE '%UNSUPORTED%'
SELECT count(*) FROM domains WHERE name LIKE '%INVALID%'
SELECT count(*), providers.name as provider FROM domains INNER JOIN providers ON providers.id = domains.provider_id GROUP BY providers.name

panels.description: Valores aproximados utilizando padrão de nomes

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) as americanas FROM domains WHERE name LIKE '%americana%' OR name LIKE '%acom'
SELECT count(*) as submarino FROM domains WHERE name LIKE '%sub%'
SELECT count(*) as soub FROM domains WHERE name LIKE '%soub%'
SELECT count(*) as shop FROM domains WHERE name LIKE '%shop%'
SELECT count(*) as b2w FROM domains WHERE name LIKE '%b2w%'
SELECT count(*) as ame FROM domains WHERE name NOT LIKE '%amer%' AND name LIKE '%ame%'

SELECT count(*) as outros FROM domains WHERE 
  name NOT LIKE '%americanas%' AND 
  name NOT LIKE '%ame%' AND 
  name NOT LIKE '%b2w%' AND
  name NOT LIKE '%shop%' AND
  name NOT LIKE '%soub%' AND
  name NOT LIKE '%sub%'

panels.title: Relação de domínios por marca

panels.description: Domínios que expiraram no mês anterior onde não foi identificada a renovação, por permanência da data de expiração antiga

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*), providers.name FROM domains 
	INNER JOIN 
	  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id
	  
  WHERE 
	-- DAY 1 OF THIS MONTH
		expiration_date >= CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 - INTERVAL '1 month' as DATE) as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT MONTH
		expiration_date < CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 as TEXT)
	

GROUP BY providers.name

SELECT count(*) FROM domains 
	INNER JOIN 
	  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id
	  
  WHERE 
	-- DAY 1 OF THIS MONTH
		expiration_date >= CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 - INTERVAL '1 month' as DATE) as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT MONTH
		expiration_date < CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 as TEXT)

panels.title: Domínios vencidos

targets.rawSql:
SELECT domains.name, providers.name as Provedor FROM domains 

INNER JOIN 
  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id

WHERE 
	-- DAY 1 OF THIS MONTH
		expiration_date >= CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 - INTERVAL '1 month' as DATE) as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT MONTH
		expiration_date < CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 as TEXT)
		
	ORDER BY expiration_date

panels.title: Nome dos domínios que estão vencidos

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*) FROM domains WHERE 
	-- DAY 1 OF THIS MONTH
		expiration_date >= CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT MONTH
		expiration_date < CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 + INTERVAL '1 month' as DATE) as TEXT)

SELECT count(*), providers.name FROM domains 
	INNER JOIN 
	  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id
  WHERE 
	-- DAY 1 OF THIS MONTH
		expiration_date >= CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT MONTH
		expiration_date < CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 + INTERVAL '1 month' as DATE) as TEXT)

GROUP BY providers.name

SELECT domains.name, domains.expiration_date, providers.name as Provedor FROM domains 

INNER JOIN 
  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id

WHERE 
	-- DAY 1 OF THIS MONTH
		expiration_date >= CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT MONTH
		expiration_date < CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 + INTERVAL '1 month' as DATE) as TEXT)
		
	ORDER BY expiration_date

panels.title: Nome dos domínios que expiram no próximo mês

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*) FROM domains WHERE 
	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT MONTH
		expiration_date >= CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 + INTERVAL '1 month' as DATE) as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT+NEXT MONTH
		expiration_date < CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 + INTERVAL '2 month' as DATE) as TEXT)

panels.title: Domínios que expiram no próximo mês

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*), providers.name FROM domains 
	INNER JOIN 
	  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id
  WHERE 
  	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT MONTH
  		expiration_date >= CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 + INTERVAL '1 month' as DATE) as TEXT)
  	AND 
  	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT+NEXT MONTH
  		expiration_date < CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 + INTERVAL '2 month' as DATE) as TEXT)

GROUP BY providers.name

panels.title: Domínios que expiram no próximo mês (por fornecedor)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT domains.name, domains.expiration_date, providers.name as Provedor FROM domains 

INNER JOIN 
  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id

WHERE 
  -- DAY 1 OF NEXT MONTH
		expiration_date >= CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 + INTERVAL '1 month' as DATE) as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- DAY 1 OF NEXT+NEXT MONTH
		expiration_date < CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE - CAST(extract(day from current_date) as integer) + 1 + INTERVAL '2 month' as DATE) as TEXT)
		
	ORDER BY expiration_date

panels.title: Nome dos domínios que expiram no próximo mês

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*) FROM domains WHERE 
	-- TODAY
		expiration_date >= CAST(CURRENT_DATE as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- 90 DAYS LATER
		expiration_date < CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '90 day' as DATE) as TEXT)

panels.title: Domínios que expiram dentro de 90 dias

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*), providers.name FROM domains 
	INNER JOIN 
	  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id
  WHERE 
	-- TODAY
		expiration_date >= CAST(CURRENT_DATE as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- 90 DAYS LATER
		expiration_date < CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '90 day' as DATE) as TEXT)

GROUP BY providers.name

panels.title: Domínios que expiram no próximo mês (por fornecedor)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT domains.name, domains.expiration_date, providers.name as Provedor FROM domains 

INNER JOIN 
  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id

WHERE 
	-- TODAY
		expiration_date >= CAST(CURRENT_DATE as TEXT)
	AND 
	-- 90 DAYS LATER
		expiration_date < CAST(CAST(CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '90 day' as DATE) as TEXT)		
	ORDER BY expiration_date

panels.title: Nome dos domínios que expiram dentro de 90 dias

targets.rawSql: SELECT expiration_date, count(*) FROM domains WHERE expiration_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY expiration_date ORDER BY expiration_date

panels.title: Quantidade de Domínios que irão expirar por data

targets.rawSql: SELECT name, email FROM admins
SELECT name, email FROM registrants
SELECT name, email FROM techs
SELECT name, email FROM registrars

panels.title: Domínios que precisam de monitoramento manual por não serem suportados ou inválidos

targets.rawSql:
SELECT domains.name as UNSUPORTEDS, providers.name as provider FROM domains 
INNER JOIN 
  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id
  
WHERE domains.name LIKE '%UNSUPORTED%'

SELECT domains.name as INVALIDS, providers.name as provider FROM domains 
INNER JOIN 
  providers on providers.id = domains.provider_id
WHERE domains.name LIKE '%INVALID%'
SELECT name as All FROM domains WHERE name LIKE '%UNSUPORTED%' OR name LIKE '%INVALID%'

panels.title: Nome dos domínios não suportados ou inválidos
